CustomField.description:
This field is set to indicate if a user wants to receive a birthday reminder for those contacts that they have an interest in as recorded on the SA Contact Team Member object.
(CRM Birthday Reminder Case# 207 C Reinecke 2010/09)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate if you would like to receive birthday reminders for contacts that you are the owner or client owner of or that you are on the client contact team.
CustomField.label: Birthday Reminders
